item.title: Delta Electronics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Delta Electronics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 10, 2024Delta Electronics, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Delta Electronics products as listed onwww.deltaww.com.

item.title: “CVE List Keyword Search” Now Available on CVE.ORG Website
item.description: “CVE List Keyword Search” Now Available on CVE.ORG WebsiteblogBy CVE Program|December 11, 2024The ability to searchCVE Recordsby keyword is now available onCVE.ORG. Keywords may include aCVE ID(e.g., CVE-2024-1234), or one or more keywords separated by a space (e.g., authorization, SQL Injection, cross site scripting, etc.).

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on November 13 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on November 13 Now AvailablenewsDecember 17, 2024TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on November 13, 2024. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: CVE Program’s 25th Anniversary Is Main Topic of “Below the Surface” Podcast
item.description: CVE Program’s 25th Anniversary Is Main Topic of “Below the Surface” PodcastblogBy CVE Program|December 17, 2024The25th anniversary of the Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE®) Programis the main topic of the “BTS #43 — CVE Turns 25” episode of Eclypsium’s “Below the Surface” podcast.

item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 233 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 16, 2024
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 233 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for December 16, 2024blogBy CVE Program|December 17, 2024The “CNA Enrichment Recognition List” for December 16, 2024, is now available with 233 CNAs listed. Published every two weeks on the CVE website, the list recognizes thoseCVE Numbering Authorities (CNAs)that are actively providing enhanced vulnerability data in theirCVE Records. CNAs are added to the list if they provideCommon Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS)andCommon Weakness Enumeration (CWE™)information 98% of the time or more within the two-week period of their last published CVE Record.

item.title: Automox Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Automox Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Automox Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all products created by Automox.

item.title: Delinea Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Delinea Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Delinea, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities in Delinea products or services listed ondelinea.com, or vulnerabilities in third-party products or services discovered by or reported to Delinea, unless covered by the scope of another CNA.

item.title: CEPHEID Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: CEPHEID Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024CEPHEIDis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Cepheid products.

item.title: S21sec Cyber Solutions by Thales Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: S21sec Cyber Solutions by Thales Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024CS21sec Cyber Solutions by Thalesis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities discovered by S21sec that are not within another CNA’s scope.

item.title: Roche Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Roche Diagnostics Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsDecember 17, 2024Roche Diagnosticsis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Roche’s medical technology products.
